A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It was quite interesting\, but it dragged on for too long with extra stories that could've been developed without thirty minutes of wasted time. I was really ready to walk out.(SPOILERS AHEAD)








I also didn't like the fact that all the development of  Ray and Finn's relationship was wasted time as well. I hate that I had the assumption that they were going to be together\, but to be let down in the end. And that luke died. That was very sad 


Overall\, I would've enjoyed it more if it wasn't so damn long
